amendment.description: Amendments en bloc sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill Federal laws that protect senior citizens under the Older Americans Act, and juveniles under the Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (comprised of amendments numbered 19 and 93 as printed in the Congressional Record) to provide that the bill would not apply to laws and regulations pertaining to the Older Americans Act or the Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Act.

action.text: On agreeing to the Martinez amendments (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 126 - 296 (Roll no. 69).
